main.name: Chanchal Sobhwani
main.bio: Hi there! I am Chanchal Sobhwani! A Professional, who is eagerly waiting to grabthe opportunity in its field, simultaneously toexplore and to serve society. Dynamic professional with a solid foundation incompliance management of company. Proven ability to enhance team performance through effective communication and strong organisational skills.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for any leads!

education.school01: Institute of Company Secretaries of India
education.degree01: CS Professional - Group 1: 150/300,Group 2: 158/300 (exemption in CRILW), Group 3: 150/300
education.degree02: CS Executive - Group 1: 211/400 (exemption in SBEC & Tax Laws) Group 2: 244/400 (exemption in CMA & EBCL)
education.degree21: Govt. K.M.T. Girls College, Raigarh, C.G.

work.title: CS Management Trainee
work.description1: • Handling all company secretarial functions required as per Companies Act, 2013.
work.description2: • Drafted and implemented the Prevention of Sexual Harassment(POSH) policy of one of the group company of NECO.
work.description3: • Managed physical share transfers, including preparing Form SH-4, issuing share certificates, and handling share split documentation.
work.description4: • Application for ISIN (International Securities Identification Number)for equity shares, Dematerializing physical shares and Co-ordination with Depository.
work.description5: • Liasioning for opening of current Bank A/c and Foriegn currency A/cgift city, Gandhi nagar for various group companies.
work.description6: • Conducted search of companies from V2 and V3 Portal and assistedlegal department with preparation of search report.
work.description7: • Increase in Authorised and Paid-up Share Capital as per Companies Act, 2013.
work.description8: • Pledging of promoter shares, Involved in ODI transaction and Refinancing.
work.description9: • Rights issue process, including filing PAS-3 forms for private placement.
work.description10: • Conducted Board Meetings, Annual General Meetings, Extra-Ordinary General Meetings, Committee Meetings & preparation of necessary documents like Notice, Agenda, Notes to Agendas, Drafts Resolution, Attendance Sheet, Preparation of Minutes and other ancillary secretarial documents thereof.
work.description11: • Pledging of promoter shares, Involved in ODI transaction and Refinancing.
work.description12: • Co-ordination with Director, Management, Internal Departments & other Stakeholders.
work.description13: • Showcased strong organizational skills by effectively managing multiple projects and tasks simultaneously, meeting all deadlines and maintaining high level of performance under pressure.

testimonials.text: I was impressed by Paurush's ability to handle any situation calmly and patiently, good team player . Keep up the good work
Paurush is very strong with his front end skills (react js). He is very passionate about his learning and growing as an individual in team.
Paurush is most dedicated professional I’ve worked with. We worked together at Infosys and he helped me a lot to get started and also to understand internal processes.

I know paurush as a hard-working and very serious team player. He is energetic, helpful, positive attitude person. His expertise as a developer considerable and his contribution is valuable to project.
Paurush is a hard working guy having a vast knowledge in his technical field. Apart from academics he is also a good team player and fully dedicated person towards his Goals.
testimonials.user: Ashar Jami (Site Engineer, Muthroot FinCorp Ltd.)

testimonials.text: A hard working and fun loving person, would be the best way to describe Paurush. His optimism at the workplace is appreciable. A curious guy, who never settles for average and puts all his effort to attain perfection in whatever he does.
